attributes.title: Syslog Intro
attributes.visState:
{"aggs":[],"params":{"fontSize":10,"markdown":"Use the [Syslog Dashboard](#/dashboard/ac6e6490-3021-11e8-9faf-f77fbc81a50d) to explore this data

Syslog data is loaded via the following methods:
* Files in the `/logstash/syslog/` directory.
 dashboard index-pattern map search visualization NOTE: Create e.g. `/logstash/syslog/2018/` for files that should be loaded as if they are from the year 2018. If the logs have ISO8601 timestamps, this is unnecessary will be ignored if present.
* [filebeat](https://www.elastic.co/products/beats/filebeat) messages sent to TCP 5044
* Network syslog messages sent to UDP or TCP port 5514
* Network RELP messages sent to TCP 5516","openLinksInNewTab":false},"title":"Syslog Intro","type":"markdown"}
